critique: The document expresses profound sadness and grief due to the sudden and tragic death of several high-ranking officials. The language used is formal and somber, reflecting the gravity of the situation. The circular and orders explicitly mention grief, mourning, and the painful nature of the event. There is also an element of surprise due to the unexpected nature of the accident. Disgust and fear are less prominent, but a sense of shock and dismay is present. Joy is absent.
